weekly picks (Aug 4 week 2024)

Posted on August 26, 2024 in 2024aug,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Aug 4th week collection

  2. 2408.12650v1 The Kondo impurity in the large spin limit (arXiv)

  3. 2408.12652v1 Layer skyrmions for ideal Chern bands and twisted bilayer graphene (arXiv)

  6. 2408.12701v1 Magnetism of the Bilayer Wigner Crystal (arXiv)

  9. 2408.12903v1 Time-resolved sensing of electromagnetic fields with single-electron interferometry (arXiv)

  10. 2408.12911v1 Ground state of the S = 1/2 Heisenberg spin chain with random ferro- and antiferromagnetic couplings (arXiv)

  11. 2408.12912v1 Real-time control of non-Abelian anyons in Kitaev spin liquid under energy dissipation (arXiv)

  12. 2408.12985v1 Closing in on possible scenarios for infinite-layer nickelates: comparison of dynamical mean-field theory with angular-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (arXiv)

  13. 2408.13051v1 Eliminating Surface Oxides of Superconducting Circuits with Noble Metal Encapsulation (arXiv)

  14. 2408.13081v1 Magnetic correlations and Griffith-like phase in Co2TiSi0.5Al0.5 Heusler alloy (arXiv)

  15. 2408.13095v1 Energy-efficient field-free unconventional spin-orbit torque magnetization switching dynamics in van der Waals heterostructures (arXiv)

  16. 2408.13099v1 Theory of ac magnetoelectric transport in normal-metal - magnetic-insulator heterostructures (arXiv)

  17. 2408.13145v1 Quantum-critical and dynamical properties of the XXZ bilayer with long-range interactions (arXiv)

  18. 2408.12704v1 A General Framework for Gradient-Based Optimization of Superconducting Quantum Circuits using Qubit Discovery as a Case Study (arXiv)

  19. 2408.12758v1 Month-long-lifetime microwave spectral holes in an erbium-doped scheelite crystal at millikelvin temperature (arXiv)

  20. 2408.12776v1 Surface plasmon-mediated photoluminescence boost in graphene-covered CsPbBr3 quantum dots (arXiv)

  21. 2408.12868v1 Effective field theories of dissipative fluids with one-form symmetries (arXiv)

  22. 2408.12896v1 Identifying band structure changes of FePS3 across the antiferromagnetic phase transition (arXiv)

  23. 2408.12993v1 Assessing the nature of nanoscale ferroelectric domain walls in lead titanate multilayers (arXiv)

  24. 2408.13033v1 Emergence of global receptive fields capturing multipartite quantum correlations (arXiv)

  25. 2408.13042v1 Anisotropic sub-band splitting mechanisms in strained HgTe: a first principles study (arXiv)

  26. 2408.13090v1 Direct observation of structural phase transformations during continuous phosphorus deposition on Cu(111) (arXiv)
